problems.title: Check if String is Palindrome
problems.description:
Check if the given string is a palindrome. A palindrome reads the same forwards and backwards (ignoring case). Print "true" if palindrome, otherwise print "false".

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print "true" or "false".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
racecar

Sample Output
true

Sample Input
Hello

Sample Output
false

Explanation:
"racecar" reads same forwards and backwards, so it's a palindrome.
hintsList: Compare characters from start and end. Convert to lowercase before comparing if needed. Use two pointers.
